title: Correction: Brain changes due to hypoxia during light anaesthesia can be prevented by deepening anaesthesia; a study in rats
content: by Setayesh R. Tasbihgou, Mina Netkova, Alain F. Kalmar, Janine Doorduin, Michel M. R. F. Struys, Regien G. Schoemaker, Anthony R. Absalom
author: Setayesh R. Tasbihgou
